verbs.description: [V: Call] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: the “ Trump Effect ”] - A recent rise in “ evangelizing and religious bigotry ” from Christian extremists in the U.S. armed forces constitutes a “ national security threat . ”
Call it the “ Trump Effect ” - A recent rise in “ [V: evangelizing] and religious bigotry ” from Christian extremists in the U.S. armed forces constitutes a “ national security threat . ”

Call it the “ Trump Effect ” - [ARG0: A recent rise in “ evangelizing and religious bigotry ” from Christian extremists in the U.S. armed forces] [V: constitutes] [ARG1: a “ national security threat] . ”
